thread.section_title: Maine Lobster Now Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Maine Lobster Now | www.mainelobsternow.com
thread.title: Josh
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by Josh

author: Josh
title: Josh
text:
awesome quality lobsters!! great service and a really neat gift idea. A friend of ours from Maine sent us a gift certificate and I made my fianc√© a 2 lobster dinner with lobster bisque and bread rolls, corn on the cob, salad and cheesy roasted potatoes and a bottle of wine for a special meal as I am deploying to the middle east shortly. Thankyou Maine Lobster Now for an amazing evening and great memories. I fully expect to use your services again and will recommend you to others.
Josh and Lanita
